name: CastleMAGE
description:
CastleMAGE the super addictive original match 3 puzzle game with a twist played by millions!
3x bushes become a tree, 3x trees become a forest and so on.
3x Rocks become wall, 3x walls become towers, 3x towers become castles, you get the idea, now master it!

Build towers, castles, farms and windmills by matching 3 objects! Harvest goods to buy missing pieces and collect gold to cast fun magic spells!

Really easy at first, challenging as you get better!

- Unlock bigger and better items, secret last level items!

- Amazingly fun gameplay that is easy to learn and hard to master!

- Trade goods and purchase magic spells to transform the game.

- Experience beautiful 3D isometric graphics as you build game.

Take control of your land today and start your rise to power!

CastleMAGE is completely free to play, you can advance quicker with in-app purchases.

Easy to play Match 3 Game! match 3 items and they grow to next item. Super addictive game, easy to play hard to master!
